section.title: How to use inflectedForm
section.para: This is an entry from a hypothetical Irish dictionary for the headword "folúsghlantóir" ("vacuum cleaner") which gives its two inflected forms, the singular genitive and the plural.

example.title: Pseudocode
example.programlisting: - entry (headword: folúsghlantóir) - partOfSpeech (tag: n-masc) - inflectedForm (tag: sg-gen, text: folúsghlantóra) - inflectedForm (tag: pl, text: folúsghlantóirí) - sense...
